name: Dystopixelia
description:
A story driven dystopian horror platformer where you play as ID 22, an employee of LIFE inc, who keeps slacking off. That will be the cause of a terrible accident which will force you to do whatever it takes to survive. Be it looting dead people for food, ammo for your weapons and kicking in monster/human heads!

Ultimately the world as you know it will end, and you will be either its saviour or destroyer.
